segments.source_content:
---
slug: /115
title: "This Week In React #115: Astro, Radix, Remix, Next.js, MDX, Storybook, Expo 46, Skia, TanStack, TC39, Docusaurus..."
authors: [slorber]
date: 08-05-2022
---
This Week In React #115: Astro, Radix, Remix, Next.js, MDX, Storybook, Expo 46, Skia, TanStack, TC39, Docusaurus...
<!-- truncate -->
Hi everyone!
Following the successful launch of Docusaurus 2.0, I didn't have time to send out the newsletter scheduled for earlier this week 😅

translations.zh-hant: 在成功推出 Docusaurus 2.0 後，我沒時間按計劃在本週早些時候發送通訊 😅

segments.source_content: This is another special edition, on a Friday night, covering almost 3 weeks of news, and a lot has happened!

translations.zh-hant: 這是另一個特別版，在週五晚上發布，涵蓋了近三週的新聞，而且發生了很多事！

segments.source_content: Impossible to read everything or comment 😬. I made the choice to be exhaustive and include all the links that seemed interesting to me, without necessarily commenting on them. I would already have to read them myself before 😅 a bit overwhelmed now.

translations.zh-hant: 不可能全部閱讀或評論 😬。我選擇全面收錄所有我覺得有趣的連結，但不一定逐一點評。我自己都還沒來得及讀完 😅 現在有點忙不過來。

segments.source_content: During this month of August, I will focus on my Revue migration to ConvertKit. The next edition will be around August 20th, but it's also possible I skip it and won't send anything until early September.

translations.zh-hant: 八月份我將專注於將 Revue 遷移到 ConvertKit。下一期將在 8 月 20 日左右發布，但也有可能跳過，直到九月初才會發送任何內容。

segments.source_content: Anyway, since we won't see each other for a while, at least you'll have something to read this summer 🤣

translations.zh-hant: 總之，既然我們有段時間不會見面，至少這個夏天你有東西可讀了 🤣

segments.source_content:

- 🇫🇷 [ReactHebdo.fr](https://reacthebdo.fr/)
[![](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/749374/153181021-8fdb0ece-270a-4cf2-980b-4557d04316ad.png)](https://thisweekinreact.com/md)
## React
[**Announcing Docusaurus 2.0**](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2022/08/01/announcing-docusaurus-2.0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

Docusaurus is the React framework I'm working on with Meta. We just released v2.0. Very happy with this release which has been relayed all over! 💝 Thanks so much for participating and contributing to the success! 🙏 Useful links:

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 是我與 Meta 合作開發的 React 框架。我們剛發布了 v2.0。對這次發布非常滿意，它已被廣泛傳播！💝 非常感謝大家的參與和貢獻！🙏 實用連結：

segments.source_content:
- 📜 [Issue #114 was dedicated to the launch](https://www.getrevue.co/profile/thisweekinreact/issues/this-week-in-react-114-official-launch-of-docusaurus-2-0-1273933?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 🥇 [Product of the day on Product Hunt](https://www.producthunt.com/posts/docusaurus-2-0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) 🥇🤩
- 🎨 [deployment demo on Vercel by Lee Robinson](https://twitter.com/leeerob/status/1554211061284364290?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- 📜 [Easy documentation with Docusaurus and Nx](https://blog.nrwl.io/easy-documentation-with-docusaurus-and-nx-4b932d8ad0e4?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

translations.zh-hant: 一份每日通訊，精選三篇關於軟體工程所有領域的技術深度解析。

segments.source_content: [G2i: 100% Remote JavaScript Jobs](https://welcome.g2i.co/apply?campaign=marketing-partner-newsletters&utm_campaign=Marketing%20Partner%20Newsletters&utm_medium=email&utm_source=TWIR)

G2i is the only hiring platform that puts developer health first. We connect React and React Native freelancers with great companies committed to improving developers' mental, physical, and emotional health and well-being. [Apply to join](https://welcome.g2i.co/apply?campaign=marketing-partner-newsletters&utm_campaign=Marketing%20Partner%20Newsletters&utm_medium=email&utm_source=TWIR) today.

translations.zh-hant: G2i 是唯一將開發者健康放在首位的招聘平台。我們將 React 和 React Native 自由工作者與致力於改善開發者心理健康、生理健康和情緒福祉的優秀公司聯繫起來。立即[申請加入](https://welcome.g2i.co/apply?campaign=marketing-partner-newsletters&utm_campaign=Marketing%20Partner%20Newsletters&utm_medium=email&utm_source=TWIR)。

segments.source_content: Gabe Greenberg, founder of G2i, has launched a fund on [**developerhealth.org**](https://developerhealth.org/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) to provide financial assistance for the dev community. Developer are welcome to apply and use the fund for counseling/therapy, paid time between freelance projects, loan assistance, child care services, medical visits and expenses, etc.

translations.zh-hant: G2i 創辦人 Gabe Greenberg 在[**developerhealth.org**](https://developerhealth.org/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) 上設立基金，為開發者社群提供財務援助。開發者可申請將資金用於諮商/治療、自由專案間帶薪休假、貸款協助、托兒服務、醫療就診及費用等用途。

segments.source_content: ## React-Native
[**Pedal to the Metal**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter&v=uvLQ5f3KDXk)

🤯 This video by William Candillon is my favorite! You must watch it even if it's just for the intro, and the quality of the production👌 It includes the latest news of React-Native-Skia which goes into alpha, is included in Expo Go via Expo SDK 46, supports Snack, supports the web (with a Remotion starter), not to mention the perf improvements on the reconciler... In short, it moves fast and this is very exciting! It's also a nice collaboration with Shopify, Expo, Google, Remotion...

translations.zh-hant: 🤯 William Candillon 的這部影片是我的最愛！即便只看開場介紹和製作品質👌也值得觀賞。內容涵蓋 React-Native-Skia 的最新進展：進入 alpha 階段、通過 Expo SDK 46 整合到 Expo Go、支援 Snack、支援網頁版（含 Remotion 入門模板），更不用說協調器的效能提升...總之進展神速且令人振奮！這也是與 Shopify、Expo、Google、Remotion 的精彩合作成果！

segments.source_content: ## Other

- [npm Dependency Selector Syntax](https://github.blog/changelog/2022-08-03-introducing-the-new-npm-dependency-selector-syntax/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- [ESLint's new config system](https://eslint.org/blog/2022/08/new-config-system-part-1/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- [@container and :has(): landing in Chromium 105](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/has-with-cq-m105/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- [CSS transforms with individual transform properties](https://web.dev/css-individual-transform-properties/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- [Which generator builds Markdown the fastest?](https://www.zachleat.com/web/build-benchmark/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- [New WebKit Features in Safari 15.6](https://webkit.org/blog/13009/new-webkit-features-in-safari-15-6/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- [Help pick a syntax for CSS nesting](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/help-css-nesting/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- [Deno - Roll your own JavaScript runtime](https://deno.com/blog/roll-your-own-javascript-runtime?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- [Deno 1.24](https://deno.com/blog/v1.24?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
- [Electron 20.0](https://www.electronjs.org/blog/electron-20-0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)
